item.title: AI and how i use it
item.author: cph-ja472@stud.ek.dk (Jesper Andersen)
item.description:
Alrighty, lets try to actually get a real “first” blogpost going for this site.

For today topic i wanted to adress a little bit about my personal use of AI, briefly what my opinion is on the doomsday talk about it taking our jobs and how i use it day-to-day as a new programmer in a field where everything apparently is changing how it gets done just as i get into it.
